paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the HR+/HER2− subgroup one patient was carrier of a gBRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.S2835*).
In the HR+/HER2− subgroup two patients were identified with a gBRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.S2835*).

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 mutations are associated with increased risk of breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The gBRCA2 mutations were confirmed by routine genetic analysis due to young age or family history.
variants.additional_notes: No additional functional assays or population frequency data were provided.
key_quotes: In the HR+/HER2− subgroup two patients were identified with a gBRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.S2835*).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the HR+/HER2− subgroup two patients were identified with a gBRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.S1271*).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly the patient with gBRCA1 mutation additionally had a somatic BRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.S3250*).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In Level IIIA we detected one somatic BRCA2 mutation (BRCA2 p.E1879fs) in a HER2+ tumor.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
